sub_topic: Probability of a certain weather event occurring
message_1: A student wants to know the probability that it will rain on his math exam day. Based on past data, the probability of rain on any given day is 0.3. His math exam is scheduled for the upcoming Friday. What is the probability of rain on Friday during his math exam?
message_2: The probability of rain on any given day is 0.3. Since the student's math exam is on Friday, the probability of rain on Friday during his math exam is also 0.3.
